item.description:
PILOBOLUS

Members of this world-renowned dance company will captivate you with their amazing body contortions, movements and sense of humor.  Food and beverages including beer and wine will be available for purchase.

Pilobolus was voted Best of Connecticut Dance Troupe by Connecticut Magazine in Sept. 2010!

  DRESS WARMLY!!!

<object width="420" height="345"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/RPERVDVHAr4?version=3&hl=en_US"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/RPERVDVHAr4?version=3&hl=en_US" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="420" height="345" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true"></embed></object>

 

PARK RULES & REGULATIONS - Please note: Due to liability and legal restrictions, NO OUTSIDE ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES of any kind may be brought into the Riverfront Parks by any party. Riverfront Recapture is the only licensed authority to sell and serve liquor for consumption in the Riverfront Parks.

 

PARKING 

The Plaza does not have its own parking lot.  Parking is available at Hartford area garages, on-street parking, or you can park in East Hartford and take the short walk over the Founders Bridge Promenade.

CT Science Center/ Riverfront Garage - located next to the Plaza, this garage provides the most direct and convenient access to Riverfront Mortensen Plaza. (Handicap accessible)
$7 Event Rate for most events, otherwise hourly charges apply (subject to change).
Hours: 6AM - 8PM, Monday-Friday, 8AM- 6PM, Saturday and Sunday.  Please note:  This garage closes one hour after the conclusion of Riverfront events.
Address: 250 Columbus Blvd. – Entrance on Grove Street

Constitution Plaza Garage - $5 Event Rate (Handicap accessible - Mortensen Riverfront Plaza visitors parking in this lot requiring handicap accessibilty should use the elevator located on Columbus Boulevard. The entrance to the elevator is to the right of the staircase. )
Address: 109 Constitution Plaza

Morgan Street Garage - $4 Event Rate
Address:  155 Morgan Street – Entrance on Talcott Street

CT Convention Center Garage - Address: 100 Columbus Boulevard
$7 Event Rate for most events, otherwise hourly charges apply (subject to change).
item.how_to_find_us: I will have black and white balloons flying .
